review_data.title: Persönlich, freundlich und preiswert
review_data.content: Frische Salate, feine Beilagen, wunderbare Fleischstücke vom Grill, Dazu ein freundliches "Grüezi" und ein Lächeln. Kaum zu glauben, dies alles...More

review_data.title: Good business lunch
review_data.content: Very good business canteen. After working for half a year for ABB, I can say I'm very happy with the business canteen. Even though for people who are not employed by ABB or AXA the prices are slightly higher, I still think that you can...More

review_data.title: ABB cafeteria
review_data.content: This is a normal cafeteria in the Cityport building which is the main headquarter of ABB. They are opened only during lunch time, and they server some cold snacks for breakfast as well as coffee. The outdoor seating is nice, during sunny days. The food...More

review_data.title: Mässiger Kantinenmampf. Wer nicht muss, sollte woanders hingehen.
review_data.content: Wer Kantinenverpflegung und Convenience Food liebt, der ist hier richtig. Eng gestuhlt, jedes Brotli kostet extra, nur das Wasser vom...More

review_data.title: Business lunch
review_data.content: This restaurant basically belongs to the offices of ABB, which are attached to it, so expect a lot of hungry suits arriving between 12.00 and 12.30. Very good selection of food at cheap prices and suitable for all tastes with a good salad buffet. Not...More

review_data.title: Good for a quick business lunch
review_data.content: While visiting CityPort we were invited to have lunch at this place. The food selection is quite large and the taste is good. The prices are on the reasonable side. It is the perfect place for a quick bite not far from the office.

review_data.title: Daily lunch
review_data.content: If you want a reasonably lunch surrounded by business types then it's fine - just make sure you go after 12:45 to miss the initial rush !

review_data.title: Ciudad para vivir
